name: Hard Hats
description: A sturdy and impact-resistant head protection gear designed for mining operations

name: Safety Gloves
description: Durable gloves made with cut-resistant materials and enhanced grip  Providing hand protection in mining environments

name: Safety Goggles
description: Protective eyewear with impact-resistant lenses and anti-fog coating  Safeguarding the eyes from debris  dust  and chemicals

name: High-Visibility Vests
description: Reflective vests to ensure visibility and safety in low-light conditions  Helping to prevent accidents at mining sites

name: Respiratory Masks
description: Filtering masks that protect against harmful particles  dust  and gases commonly found in mining environments

name: Safety Boots
description: Heavy-duty boots with reinforced toecaps and slip-resistant soles  Providing foot protection and stability in mining operations

name: Safety Harnesses
description: Harness systems with secure attachments for workers  Preventing falls and ensuring safety when working at heights in mining sites

name: Gas Detectors
description: Advanced gas monitoring devices that detect and alert workers about the presence of hazardous gases in the mining environment

name: Safety Signage
description: Clearly labeled signs and markers that provide important safety information  warnings  and instructions at mining sites

name: Safety Training Materials
description: Educational resources and training modules focused on mining safety practices  Promoting awareness and knowledge among workers
price: Varies based on the training program
